description.displayText: Victoria was incredible with our 5 month old boy! She was very attentive, read to him a lot, and was actively engaged with him.  She can dive right in without having to be told what to do, but asks really good questions on important topics when she needs parental input.  Organized and professional with references and CPR certification. Overall, a very kind and nurturing caregiver.  Any family she works with would be extremely lucky to have her.

description.displayText: I cannot say enough about Victoria! We LOVED her! She was our full-time babysitter for our two kids (3 and 6 years old).  Victoria is extremely dependable and fit in with our family right away. She was always happy get on the floor and play, she helped a ton with virtual schooling and the kids were always happy when she arrived in the morning! We knew we could count on Victoria and her go with the flow attitude and flexibly was much appreciated. She is very kind and patient but also always made sure the kids were safe and following directions. We felt comfortable with Victoria driving them to activities and taking them to the park because we always knew the kids were in good hands. We moved out of state and we wish we could have taken Victoria with us!

description.displayText: Victoria is a very sweet, caring, patient and intelligent young lady. She is prompt and very responsive and we appreciate her attention at all times. She takes proper care of our active 3 years old son and from day 1, he immediately bonded with her. She knew quickly how to get and keep his attention as well as occupy him by doing fun and educational activities. We are happy to have her on our team. We always look forward to seeing her.
